schema.name: daily_log_entry
schema.description: Stores daily performance tracking logs, with a unique entry per date, including psychological and skill development metrics.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for each daily log entry.

fields.name: data_creator
fields.description: id of the user who creates the record

fields.name: data_updater
fields.description: id of the user who updates the record

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: create time in timestamp unix

fields.name: update_time
fields.description: update time in timestamp unix

fields.name: date
fields.description: The specific date for the log entry. Each date must be unique.

compliance.reason: The date is a key part of the user's personal log.

fields.name: goals
fields.description: An array of three strings representing the main objectives for the day.

compliance.reason: Contains user's personal goals and objectives.

fields.name: execution_notes
fields.description: Detailed notes on the execution of daily tasks and goals.

compliance.reason: Contains detailed personal reflections and work notes.

fields.name: focus_rating
fields.description: A rating from 1 to 10 indicating the level of focus throughout the day.

fields.name: energy_rating
fields.description: A rating from 1 to 10 indicating the energy level throughout the day.

fields.name: difficulties
fields.description: A description of any challenges or difficulties faced during the day.

fields.name: performance_score
fields.description: An overall performance score for the day, rated from 1 to 10.

fields.name: win_lose
fields.description: A boolean value indicating if the day was considered a 'win' (true) or 'lose' (false).

compliance.reason: Binary subjective assessment of the day's outcome.

fields.name: reasoning
fields.description: Justification or reasoning behind the win/lose assessment.

fields.name: improvement_notes
fields.description: Notes on potential improvements for future days.

fields.name: motivation
fields.description: A rating from 1 to 5 indicating the level of motivation.

fields.name: anxiety
fields.description: A rating from 1 to 5 indicating the level of anxiety.

fields.name: confidence
fields.description: A rating from 1 to 5 indicating the level of confidence.

fields.name: skills
fields.description: An array of strings listing skills developed or utilized during the day.

compliance.reason: Contains user's personal skill development information.

fields.name: strengths
fields.description: An array of strings listing personal strengths observed or utilized.

compliance.reason: Contains user's personal assessment of their strengths.

fields.name: scorecard
fields.description: A JSON object summarizing the day's wins and areas for improvement.

compliance.reason: Contains a summary of personal achievements and learnings.

inner.name: wins
inner.description: An array of up to three strings detailing the key wins of the day.

inner.name: needs_improvement
inner.description: Notes on areas that need improvement based on the day's experiences.

compliance.reason: Contains a key personal area for improvement.
